category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enables the Mibbit IRC Chat Integration
If the user has to authenticate at the server (ie. at a nickserv) you can choose the method here. Don't forget to activate "Ask for password" in this case.

Should the chat directly connect to the server or should it show a form for changing the nickname first?
If you want to use the autoconnect function youhave to join the channels with mibbit first and you must type the command "/autoconnect on" with channel operator privileges first.
Enter the Chatrooms that should be joined with the chat automatically.
If you have any problem with the automatically chosen charset or you want a specific charset you can choose one here. If you leave this on "auto" the charset of your WCF will be used.

You can choose a pattern for guestnicks. The pattern must contain one or more '?'. Mibbit will replace the '?' with random chars and numbers, so that there are no naming conflicts, if there are many guests.
If you leave this blank Mibbit will use the following pattern: "mib_??????"
Here you can set the chats height (pixel).

You can set a prefix that will be prepended to the nick of registered forum users.
Only use Characters that are valid in IRC. A single prepending _ is not possible.
Should Mibbit ask for a password for authentication with the server? (see also "Authentication Method")

Enter the servers address in the following form: <domain/ip>[:port] If you enter no port the standard port 6667 will be used.
Example "webirc.gamesurge.net:6007" or "irc.undernet.org"
Choose a server. You can also use a custom server.
Should the MOTD (Message of the day) from the server be displayed after connecting to the server?
Should the server tab be displayed? The server tab displays several messages from the server.

Should the log-tab from Mibbit be displayed?
Only recommended for debugging purposes.
Here you can define a custom loading message. Language variables are supported.

Here you can enter your Mibbit settings ID for customizing the chat.
To get a settings ID you have to register with http://widget.mibbit.com/manager/ and look for your id at the preferences page.

Here you can define a custom welcome message. Language variables are supported.
Enabling this optione doesn't make any sense if you have activated "Autoconnect".
